name: ManageEnterpriseAccountUser
description:
Manage users in enterprise accounts.

Use this tool to update details of users within an enterprise account. It is suitable for modifying user information associated with managed users.

parameters.name: enterprise_account_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the enterprise account. Required to manage users within the account.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the user to be managed within the enterprise account.

parameters.name: update_user_email
parameters.description: New email for the user. Ensure enterprise account owns both original and destination domains. Follow SSO steps if applicable.

value_schema.description:
Enterprise account must own both the original and destination email domains.

*WARNING:* If SSO is required for your enterprise account, you must follow these steps precisely to
avoid locking the end user out of their account or creating duplicate accounts.

 - Use this API to update the user's email to a new value (this effectively logs the user out)
 - Use your SSO provider's (e.g. Okta's) admin panel to update the user's email to the new value
 - Tell the user to log into Airtable with the new email

parameters.name: user_first_name
parameters.description: The new first name of the user in the enterprise account.

parameters.name: user_last_name
parameters.description: The last name of the user to be updated in the enterprise account.

parameters.name: user_state
parameters.description: Specify the user's state as 'provisioned' or 'deactivated'. Only applicable for managed users.

value_schema.description:
[provisioned](/api/org-management-glossary#provisioned-user) | [deactivated](/api/org-management-glossary#deactivated-user)
Can only change the state of [managed](/api/org-management-glossary#managed-user) users.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the airtable API.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description:
Enterprise account must own both the original and destination email domains.

value_schema.description:

parameters.description:
[provisioned](/api/org-management-glossary#provisioned-user) | [deactivated](/api/org-management-glossary#deactivated-user)
Can only change the state of [managed](/api/org-management-glossary#managed-user) users.

[provisioned](/api/org-management-glossary#provisioned-user) | [deactivated](/api/org-management-glossary#deactivated-user)
Can only change the state of [managed](/api/org-management-glossary#managed-user) users.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
